You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is convenient for you to send your package. You can find a list of pickup points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do
Return preparation:
1. Check the instructions on how to return a product <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your item
3. Remove any protective film or screen protector
4. Package your item and its accessories following the guidelines below
Packaging instructions:
The box must be strong and resistant. Place your item securely inside the box so it won't move during transit.
Stick the return label on top of the box (you can also add an additional label inside to help identify your shipment in case the original label peels off or gets damaged).
Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case your item is damaged during transportation.
Your return is ready for shipping! We'll inform you when it arrives.
Best regards,
The Customer Service Team at Back Market, The Customer Service Team at Back Market
